name: It's A Hit!
Lore: 'Red Leader fired the first shot in the Death Star trench, causing massive internal damage. The spectacular near-miss inspired Red Squadron to double their efforts.',
Text: 'USED: Cancel a Force drain at a site related to a system you control.LOST: Cancel Counter Assault, It''s Worse, Elis Helrot, Tallon Roll, Limited Resources or Scanning Crew. OR Use 3 Force to search your Lost Pile and take one non-unique starfighter into hand.',
